snippet.title: Official Starmade Trailer
snippet.description:
StarMade is a voxel-based 3D sandbox space shooter. Play in your own universe or on a multiplayer server. Participate in epic fleet battles, strive to dominate entire galaxies and harness the universe’s resources for your industrious empire or the destruction of others. The universe is yours!

Build, craft, mine, trade, fight and grow into an incredible force in the universe. Create ships, stations, or grow your planetary presence, you play how you want to play. Use various warp systems to travel further distances, build your faction and start placing your mark on the galaxy, claiming territories.

Create weapons systems for your ship the way you want to use them, combine modules and effects to create new weapon combinations. Support systems increase your defensive capabilities, and with fully integrated logic and storage sorting systems you have even more possibilities.

Play today, visit http://star-made.org or find us on Steam Early Access http://store.steampowered.com/app/244770


StarMade is the first and only game by Schine GmbH, and has been in development since 2010.


Starmade - Behind the Trailer
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lMtdpulmTpo

Video created by Michael 'Bench' Debevec
http://youtube.com/benchminecraft/
https://www.facebook.com/benchminecraft

Audio composed by Daniel Tusjak
https://soundcloud.com/danieltusjak/
https://soundcloud.com/danieltusjak/starmade-trailer
